MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  CW9 postcode area of Rudheath, Northwich affecting properties in Wessex Drive, Laburnum Road and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:05AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation to investigate a suspected blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:57AM on 6th January 2021
